Articles.Content:
I'm developing a concept which makes use of Infernal Robotics. I am split whether or not to use Quantum Struts in this craft. They would improve functionality and compactness. However, I am planning to distribute this item, and I would like to reach the largest audience without compromising the quality of the device.

Edited February 22, 2017 by 0111narwhalz
Two of my favorite mods, as long as they play nicely together, use both.
